DataElement.preferredName: Demographics Primary Caregiver Marital Status Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income)._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._A demographic parameter indicating a person's conjugal status_a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income)._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._A demographic parameter indicating a person's conjugal status

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: statistical characterization of human populations (or segments of human populations broken down by age or sex or income etc.).

Concepts.definition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:A demographic parameter indicating a person's conjugal status

The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.
A demographic parameter indicating a person's current conjugal status.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
